thread.title: InsideView Hosts Second-Annual Open Lounge With Marketing and Sales Technology Expert Panels
thread.title_full: InsideView Hosts Second-Annual Open Lounge With Marketing and Sales Technology Expert Panels

author: admin
title: InsideView Hosts Second-Annual Open Lounge With Marketing and Sales Technology Expert Panels
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/11/2015 @ 6:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: InsideView 
SAN FRANCISCO, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 09/11/15 -- InsideView powers the world's business conversations. Next week, the company will be hosting business conversations live at the Open Lounge, a networking lounge and mini-summit for attendees of Dreamforce 2015 held just two blocks from Moscone Center in San Francisco. Attendees can enjoy free refreshments and hear from engaging speakers on hot topics such as Women in Tech, Social Selling, and Aligning Sales and Marketing. 
This year's Open Lounge will include sessions with leading industry experts such as Laura Ramos of Forrester, Sharon Little of Sirius Decisions, Barb Giamanco, social selling expert, and Ashu Garg of Foundation Capitol. The panels will include leading B2B technology companies representing a broad range of sales and marketing solutions, including: Brainshark, Infer, Engagio, Equifax, Insightpool, KnowledgeTree, LeanData, Marketo, MobilePaks, Totango, TrackMaven, SalesPredict, and SAP. 
Sessions will include: Social Selling with Barb Giamanco, social selling expert The Decade of the CMO with Ashu Garg, General Partner at Foundation Capital Marketing Technology Panel #Smarketing: Getting Sales & Marketing Aligned Analyst Debrief of Dreamforce Keynote with Laura Ramos, Forrester and Jim Dickie, CSO Insights 
WHAT: The Open Lounge hosted by InsideView 
WHERE: 23 Geary Street, San Francisco; Click here to register . 
WHEN: Tuesday, September 15 from 8:30 am to 6:00 pm PT Wednesday, September 16 from 9:00 am to 5:00 pm PT Thursday, September 17 from 9:00 am to 3:00 pm PT 
WHO: InsideView, leader in market intelligence. The Open Lounge is sponsored by Brainshark, Infer, Marketo, Totango, TrackMaven, SAP, Engagio, Equifax, InsightPool, KnowledgeTree, LeanData, MobilePaks, and SalesPredict, and hosted by InsideView. 
The full Open Lounge agenda is available at: http://openlounge.insideview.com/agenda/ 
About InsideView InsideView powers the world's business conversations. Our big data platform triangulates data from more than 40,000 sources and serves it directly into key sales and marketing systems. Our products provide company and contact data, social and news insights, and business connections. Sales people increase efficiency and can approach their accounts in a highly relevant way. Marketers can clean and enrich their leads and customer data. Our APIs are fueling use cases in CRM, marketing automation, predictive analytics, and a range of business applications. We call this market intelligence. For more information, follow @InsideView on Twitter, read the InsideView Blog , visit http://www.insideview.com/ , or stop by our headquarters in San Francisco, California. Contact:
